name: Plastic Bag Policy
description: Early DoSAC environmental policy proposal exploring mandatory plastic bag carrying as part of waste reduction strategy. Developed during ministerial car journey brainstorming session.

outcome.description: The department's preliminary environmental impact assessment led to the implementation of carrier bag charging regulations in October 2015, subsequently enhanced to 10p minimum in 2021.
outcome.impact: Achieved 98% reduction in single-use bag distribution across major retail partners
outcome.notes: This department's foundational policy development work established the framework for successful plastic reduction initiatives
